thread.title: #TBT: LGBT Pride In Connecticut
thread.title_full: #TBT: LGBT Pride In Connecticut - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: #TBT: LGBT Pride In Connecticut
text:
Caption 1989 - Connecticut Lesbian & Gay Pride Festival 2005 - Yale Glam Jam Michael Kodas / The Hartford Courant Trixie Spirit walks in front of the audience at the Glam Jam drag show at Yale University on April 4, 2005. Gay Pride week at Yale kicked off with a Glam Jam.
Trixie Spirit walks in front of the audience at the Glam Jam drag show at Yale University on April 4, 2005. Gay Pride week at Yale kicked off with a Glam Jam.
(Michael Kodas / The Hartford Courant) See more galleries On Oct. 10, 2008, the state Supreme Court court released an opinion guaranteeing marriage rights to same-sex couples. The first marriage licenses were issued a month later. Take a look back at some of the rallies and marches that led to the change, and the happy couples celebrating.
